result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy R White was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt: Defendant Timothy R White, in custody, in court with attorney Cana G Laska.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called 9:44 AM. State - have a resolution, counts 1 & 2, straight jail 30 days on each count, concurrent to each other but consecutive to any sentence currently serving, asks for restitution of $20 includes victim witness surcharge. Laska and White agree. Defendant pleads NC to both charges. Court recesses to allow Laska to fill out PLQ with defendant. Re-called at 10:05 AM. Same appearances. Court now has PLQ and goes over form with defendant, finds the defendant is freely, voluntarily and intelligently entering his plea, waives his constitutional rights, court finds factual basis and adjudges guilty. Bednar makes final argument and asks court to follow joint recommendation. Laska makes final argument and asks court to follow joint recommendation. White with holds comment. Proceed to sentencing. Court - Count 1 - 30 days in the FC jail, with huber and community service consecutive to any other sentence he is currently serving. Count 2 - 30 days in the FC jail concurrent to count 1, with huber and community service, consecutive to any other sentence defendant is currently serving, costs on each count - 60 DTP within release from jail, DNA with verbage, appeal rights given.
